org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.outline
Class OutlineParser

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.outline.OutlineParser

public class OutlineParser
extends Object

A parser for creating an outline of a document based on the headings in the document. Uses a markup language to determine where headings start and end.

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Green
See Also:
OutlineItem

          A document builder that creates the outline structure based on headings in the document

isBlocksOnly

protected boolean isBlocksOnly()
normally outline parsing is performed only on blocks. Overriding classes may return false if they wish to process all content.
